blog.name: todorosky
blog.title: BnHA Imagines

tags: i need to update the blog rules
so these are the good ones
title: Requests Open!
body:
One more time, here we go! Request will be open until we hit 15 new request!! :) 

RULES: 

  1. You can now request for any gender you like (we finally got there) including gender neutral, but please, you need to specify so I can know!!!
  2. Only CharacterXReader. No pairings. 
  3. Only SFW requests.
  4. We don’t do match ups. Only regular requests (scenarios, head canons, and so on)
  5. Only 3 characters per request. (This apply for headcanons as well)
  6. Requests for scenarios need to have some specifications. After some time working with little information drains my imagination. I beg of you for not only ask for “Fluffy date with x character.” IF THE REQUEST DOESN’T HAVE ANY SPECIFICATION I WILL EXERCISE MY RIGHT OF DELETING THE REQUEST.

* Have in mind that if you ask for a scenario with 3 different characters, the scenarios will automatically be shorter.

title: Life Without You
description:
by Bryan

It’s been several decades after his husband’s death. Katsuki is at a family gathering with their children, their children’s children, and now their children’s children’s child. Katuski does some reflection on his life, and well, let’s not spoil the ending.

A sort of final chapter to, How Could You Leave? by TomiTransylvania

Words: 1622, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Tomi’s oc children
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
  • Additional Tags: Heavy Angst, Angst and Feels, Emotional Hurt, Soulmates, you may need tissues, This made FoolishFortuna cry, I Made Myself Cry, Was called an asshole for writing this, Bittersweet Ending, I made TomiTransylvannia cry too

title: How Could You Leave?
description:
by TomiTransylvania

Bakugo and Kirishima have been together since they were fifteen. But at thirty a battle with a villain takes Kirishima away from Bakugo forever, leaving him alone to raise their five year old twins.

Words: 2806, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

title: » to make a fool
body:
pairing: bakugou katsuki/todoroki shouto

word count: 1,961

rating: general

summary:

Todoroki’s in his seat when he walks into the 2-A classroom, which is the first thing that tips Katsuki off that something strange is about to happen. He walks up, hands in his pockets, ready to lean down and ask what the hell Todoroki thinks he’s doing, until the other’s head whips up to glare at him.

“The hell are you staring at, Half-n-Half?”

( read here )

a little april fools’ fic i forgot to upload here!

blog.name: bnhacatcafe
blog.title: Purrs Ultra! - A BNHA Cat Cafe Zine
blog.description: This is a My Hero Academia zine shoving our favourite characters into a cat café! All profits will be donated to charity. Apps open Nov 17 - Dec 15

summary: You asked us, we listened! We’ve introduced two new tiers to our line-up! Hot Chococat is a merch-only tier, where you won’t get...
caption:
You asked us, we listened!

We’ve introduced two new tiers to our line-up!

Hot Chococat is a merch-only tier, where you won’t get a copy of the zine but will get all of the awesome merch we have!

Skinny Catpuccino is the zine with all the ‘flat’ merch, such as all the sticker sheets and all the prints, with no badges or charm!

You can preorder these, or any other tier, over in our store:
http://purrsultra.bigcartel.com

blog.name: isminetadeadyet
blog.title: Is Mineta Dead Yet?
blog.description: Has the godforsaken grape been smashed yet? Find out here as we count down the days until we celebrate with the finest of wine for the sweetest of victories.

summary: Not gonna lie, I adored bnha in all the first half of season 1, seeing dekus development and his relationship with all might...
question: Not gonna lie, I adored bnha in all the first half of season 1, seeing dekus development and his relationship with all might made my heart grow several sizes and the story was compelling, but when they got to the academy, when mineta started talking, and when he groped tsuyu? I couldn't fucking stand it, I haven't watched a single episode since, he's like black fucking mold anything he touches needs to be completely destroyed I hate this show and it's creepy ass pedophile author
answer: right? it’s terrible that he’s in there because the series itself can be really great at times! but he’s such a disgusting and useless part of the cast that it turns so many people away from experiencing what it is that the series has to offer.

reblog.comment: right? it’s terrible that he’s in there because the series itself can be really great at times! but he’s such a disgusting and useless part of the cast that it turns so many people away from experiencing what it is that the series has to offer.

summary: Plush commission of Katuski Bakugo from My Hero Academia.  By far THE most detailed plush I have made to date, and also my first...
caption:
Plush commission of Katuski Bakugo from My Hero Academia. 

By far THE most detailed plush I have made to date, and also my first time using an embroidery machine for his face, gauntlets and belt details (the mask is applique’d). He was a lot of work and a big learning experience, but he was also a lot of fun to make and I am SUPER proud of how he turned out!

reblog.comment:
Plush commission of Katuski Bakugo from My Hero Academia. 

By far THE most detailed plush I have made to date, and also my first time using an embroidery machine for his face, gauntlets and belt details (the mask is applique’d). He was a lot of work and a big learning experience, but he was also a lot of fun to make and I am SUPER proud of how he turned out!

By far THE most detailed plush I have made to date, and also my first time using an embroidery machine for his face, gauntlets and belt details (the mask is applique’d). He was a lot of work and a big learning experience, but he was also a lot of fun to make and I am SUPER proud of how he turned out!

summary:
Kirishima: *staring intensely at Amajiki*
Amajiki:.... Kirishima-kun please stop staring at me... it’s making me...
body:
Kirishima: *staring intensely at Amajiki*

Amajiki:…. Kirishima-kun please stop staring at me… it’s making me nervous…

Kirishima: sorry senpai! I was just wondering though… what would happen if you ate some of me?

Amajiki: *staring at Kirishima in abject horror*

Kirishima: like eating my hair or something! Would you temporarily get my quirk? Have you tried it before? Let’s see what’d happen!!

Amajiki: oh dear god no. Please no.

Kirishima: *chasing Amajiki around with a handful of his own hair and begging for him to eat it*

Amajiki: *nervous crying*
